title: VISA 241 Introduction to Digital Photography
description: Introduction to digital photography image creation in relation to contemporary art. Emphasis on digital camera use, file management, and digital print production.  Only one of VISA 240 and VISA 241 may be used toward the program requirements of the B.F.A. Visual Art and the B.A. Visual Art programs.
prerequisites: A score of 72% or higher in one of VISA 180, VISA 182 and all of VISA 183, VISA 110.
